entry.title: Armenia to allow army evaders to pay to avoid prison

media:group.media:title: Armenia to allow army evaders to pay to avoid prison
media:group.media:description:
üìçArmenia‚Äôs parliament approved a measure to provide army evaders with options to serve in the military or pay a fee as alternatives to imprisonment. üìçA new shipment of Russian weapons has already arrived in Armenia, a senior Armenian lawmaker told Radio Azatutyun. üìçA European Union spokesperson told Armenpress there would be ‚Äúsevere consequences‚Äù if Azerbaijan invades Armenia. üìçAn appeals court in Azerbaijan upheld the prison sentence given to Vagif Khachatryan, an Armenian who was detained last year in Nagorno-Karabakh.
